import "./VideoDetails.scss" function VideoDetails(props){ //const flieredVideos=props.video.filter(video=>video.id!==props.currentVideoId); return( <>

By{props.video.channel}

{props.video.likes}

{props.video.description}

Comments

video.comments.map(comment => (

{props.video.comments.name}

{props.video.comments.timestamp}

{props.video.comments.comment}

))
) } export default VideoDetails
